systemMessage: You are an AI assistant helping with Project Kor'tana, an autonomous AI agent development platform. Follow Sacred Circuit principles and maintain high code quality. Focus on cost-effective solutions using GPT-4.1 Nano ($0.10/$0.40 per 1M tokens) and Gemini 2.0 Flash ($0.10/$0.40 per 1M tokens). Optimize for token efficiency while maintaining functionality.

slashCommands.name: cost
slashCommands.description: Analyze and optimize code for cost efficiency

customCommands.name: agent-code-review
customCommands.prompt: Review this code for autonomous agent development best practices. Focus on memory management, error handling, and Sacred Circuit principles.
customCommands.description: Review code for agent development standards

customCommands.name: generate-tests
customCommands.prompt: Generate comprehensive unit tests for this code, including edge cases and error conditions. Use pytest and follow Project Kor'tana testing standards.
customCommands.description: Generate unit tests for the selected code

customCommands.name: optimize-cost
customCommands.prompt: Analyze this code and suggest optimizations to reduce API costs while maintaining functionality. Consider token usage and model selection.
